title: The Islanders
creator_credit: Cecil Holmes and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: Aspects of life in the Torres Strait Islands, showing the rich culture of the people with their songs and dances, set against bright tropical backgrounds, in striking contrast to many parts of Australia. Shows how strongly the old traditions still affect the people, even though they have modern schools, shops, out-board motors and transistors.
